quote: Books can truly change our lives: the lives of those who read them, the lives of those who write them. Readers and writers alike discover things they never knew about the world and about themselves.
quote_letters: BOOKS CAN TRULY CHANGE OUR LIVES THE LIVES OF THOSE WHO READ THEM THE LIVES OF THOSE WHO WRITE THEM READERS AND WRITERS ALIKE DISCOVER THINGS THEY NEVER KNEW ABOUT THE WORLD AND ABOUT THEMSELVES
